countryData.title: App Metrics and Label Data
countryData.description: As we strongly believe in Open Science, we fully disclose the metrics that the AURORA Energy Tracker uses to calculate Carbon Emissions, Energy Usage and Labels.

downloads.description: We offer the above metrics and label data, as well as our consolidated dataset for download.
